Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.client.view.GUI.FXGUI.GeneralController
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.client.view.GUI.FXGUI.LoginController
public class LoginController extends GeneralController
This class is the controller of the login scene

    • join

      public void join(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      This method is used when a Player wants to Join a party. Then, it proceeds to send a JoinRequest to the Server
      Parameters:
      e - is the mouse click on the joinButton

    • create

      public void create(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      This method is used when a Player wants to create a party. Then, the scene changes in order to insert the size of the party
      Parameters:
      e - is the mouse click on the createButton

    • gameIDChoice

      public void gameIDChoice()
      This method is assigned as onActionEvent for the sendButton after a Client receives from the net the list of the available GameIDs by the method displayAllGameIDs. Then it takes the ID and sends it to the server. If the Client writes a size that isn't a number he will be notified

    • waitingForPlayersEvent

      public void waitingForPlayersEvent(int playersRequired)
      This method is called by the GUIManger through override, when a Player joins the party that the Client is in, or the Client creates a new a party. This method shows how many players are required before starting the Game
      Overrides:
      waitingForPlayersEvent in class GeneralController
      Parameters:
      playersRequired - is the amount of the Players required in order to start the Game

    • displayAllGameIDs

      public void displayAllGameIDs(String gameIDsNotification)
      This method is called by the GUIManger through override, after a Client sends a join request and receives a Server response. Then proceeds to show the Parties available
      Overrides:
      displayAllGameIDs in class GeneralController
      Parameters:
      gameIDsNotification - is the description formatted of the parties available

    • startingGame

      public void startingGame(ArrayList<String> nicknames, List<Integer> resource, List<Integer> golden, List<Integer> aim) throws IOException
      This method is called by the GUIManger through override, when the party reaches the required size and through the net arrives at the Client a GameInitData that triggers a StartingGameMessage. Then, it proceeds to switch scene to the Game scene
      Overrides:
      startingGame in class GeneralController
      Parameters:
      nicknames - are the nicknames chosen by the Players
      resource - is the situation of the ResourceCards in CommonBoard
      golden - is the situation of the GoldenResourceCards in CommonBoard
      aim - is the situation of the AimCards in CommonBoard
      Throws:
      IOException - in case the FXML file is not found

    • failedGameID

      public void failedGameID()
      This method is called by the GUIManger through override, when the Client selects a GameID that isn't available to be joined, so it reinitialize the scene elements so the Client can choose again
      Overrides:
      failedGameID in class GeneralController

    • noActiveParties

      public void noActiveParties()
      This method is called by the GUIManger through override, when the Client wants to join a game and requests the list of the gameIDs but there are no parties available. Then, it proceeds to reinitialize the scene elements so the Client can choose again
      Overrides:
      noActiveParties in class GeneralController
